question: Which of the following is correct about Potassium carbonate?
option1: Its chemical formula is K CO<sub>3</sub>
option2: It is a salt which is white in colour
option3: It is used in the production of soap
explanation: Potassium carbonate is a salt which is white in colour. It is used in the production of soap. Its chemical formula is K<sub>2</sub> CO<sub>3</sub>.
